data.eml:eml: Historical biogeography of Thyrsophorini psocids and description of a new neotropical species of Thyrsopsocopsis (Psocodea: Psocomorpha: Psocidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cristian Román-Palacios, Alfonso N. García Aldrete, Ranulfo González Obando (2016): Historical biogeography of Thyrsophorini psocids and description of a new neotropical species of Thyrsopsocopsis (Psocodea: Psocomorpha: Psocidae). European Journal of Taxonomy 194: 1-16, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2016.194
